archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Perimeter Intrusion Detection System - Gallagher
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Energized fences are a powerful deterrent, preventing or delaying intruders. • Fully monitored fence line, attack detection and maintenance monitoring • Reliable protection day and night • Adjustable voltages, high for maximum deterrent and low for periods of low risk • Configurable protection
https://security.gallagher.com/-/media/Bynder/Security/Document/Brochures/Perimeter_Security_Product_Overview-original.pdf
